short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension build by using Angular

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension is a COVID-19 Coronavirus Tracker allowing you to track the district wise cases in India.
▸  Extension track the spread of the COVID-19 Coronavirus and stay informed
▸ Data is refreshed every time the extension is opened and can be refreshed manually with one click.
▸ Display total, active recovered, deaths cases per district.
